## Cast

```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(shiny)

shinyApp(
  fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Genotypes"),
    sidebarLayout(
      selectInput("select",
          inputId = "ACC",
          "Select Genotype:",
          choices = levels(dataCAR$ACC),
          selected = levels(dataCAR$ACC)[1],
      mainPanel()
      )
      
    )
    
  ),
  
  function(input, output) {
   output$select <- renderTable({
    (dataCAR)
  })
  }
)

```
